name: Control your Alcohol
description:
Get as many points by drinking alcohol and staying tipsy!

  • beer = 20pts, 10% alcohol
  • wine = 30pts, 
  • cocktail = 50pts
  • shot = 80pts

Make sure you're not too drunk or too sober, because you'll move slower and die. If you're too drunk and want to sober up, drink some water (=30pts).

MOVE:  arrows keys UP and DOWN

QUIT: Escape

Only works on 1920x1080 resolution
